item.title: Scaling agentic AI: Inside Atlassian’s culture of experimentation
item.description: Scaling agentic AI isn’t just about having the latest tools -- it requires clear guidance and a culture that champions experimentation.

item.title: Why investors need to stop obsessing over when the Fed is going to cut interest rates next
item.description: Higher rates, in fact, can be positive for the stock market.

item.description: If you’re like many U.S. consumers, you’re more worried now about money.

item.title: Hugging Face just launched a $299 robot that could disrupt the entire robotics industry
item.description: Hugging Face launches Reachy Mini, a $299 open-source desktop robot that democratizes AI development for millions of builders worldwide.

item.title: Millions of Americans are about to see their student loans accrue interest again. Here’s what to know.
item.description: The Trump administration said borrowers enrolled in the SAVE program will see their balances grow, starting in August.

item.title: When my friend was on her deathbed, her parents took $25,000 in cash and won’t give it to her son. Do we tell him?
item.description: “They are a very religious family. These are the same people who hug the altar every week.”
